summary: Adds funny weapons to the game made from common objects. Launch enemies with a giant's hammer or beat people with a mini skeleton.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds several ridiculous weapons to the game made out of objects from around Skyrim.
These weapons are craftable and can be bought at Belethor's general goods in Whiterun. All weapons are of Daedric quality.

So far these weapons include:
- Mr Bones
- Lil Dovah
- Lute
- Dibella statue
- Pan
- Pitchfork
- Shovel
- Charred Skeever
- Troll skull hammer
- Talos shrine (bounces target)
- Skeleton arm staff (pulls target to you)
- Giant's hammer (launches target into the sky)

If anyone likes this mod I will make more weapons.


NoteÂ [b][i]I am not an experienced modder![/i][/b]
I started making these weapons just to practice using creation kit and nifscope, but now that I made an esp I decided to upload it.
I also couldn't find another mod like this, but maybe I didn't search well enough.


Known issues:
- When these weapons are dropped they all have the physics of an iron mace, so they clip and roll around oddly
- Sometimes the Talos weapon will send enemies through the floor
- The lute uses thrusting killmoves
- The giants hammer does not kill people on hit and does not launch on killing blows



Please tell me if the mod does not work!
author: Dthirteen
